recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
recipes.instructions: Boil pasta. Cook pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine everything.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: Spicy and flavorful chicken curry with coconut milk.
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and curry powder. Pour coconut milk and simmer.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Healthy and delicious toast with mashed avocado.
recipes.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Spread on toast.

recipes.title: Chocolate Brownies
recipes.instructions: Mix butter, sugar, and cocoa powder. Add eggs and flour. Bake.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing and croutons.
recipes.instructions: Chop lettuce. Add dressing, croutons, and cheese. Toss.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick and healthy stir-fried vegetables with soy sauce.
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic. Add soy sauce. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients. Cook on a hot griddle. Serve with syrup.

recipes.title: Tomato Soup
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add tomatoes and basil. Blend and simmer.

recipes.title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
recipes.description: Juicy shrimp cooked in garlic butter sauce.
recipes.instructions: Sauté garlic in butter. Add shrimp and cook. Finish with lemon juice.

recipes.title: Mango Smoothie
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.
